ygData.subject: Re: Implementing Multiple Filters
ygData.msgSnippet: In my own system, I filter results like so: http://benssite.com/parts/filterby:colour=red and additionally:

In my own system, I filter results like so:

http://benssite.com/parts/filt=
erby:colour=3Dred

and additionally:

http://benssite.com/parts/filterby:co=
lour=3Dred&filterby:size=3Dsmall

When read, it kinda makes sense.

Hope th=
at helps!
